title: Taking Turns
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 70 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: Who will go first? In Taking Turns, students will learn about the importance of taking turns during various activities. Students have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge as well as sequence events. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support beginning readers.
reviewWords: cut out, drink, first, read, slide, turn
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /t/ sound
grammar: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginnings of sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word then
